title: Important Things Are Simple | A Week Without Complaining
description:
“It’s hard to be an academic who specializes in Stoicism. Because the philosophy is so complex? On the contrary. Stoicism is a difficult choice for tenure because it’s so simple. The Stoics say what they mean and they say it clearly.”

Ryan discusses the beauty of simplicity, and reads this week’s meditation from The Daily Stoic Journal, on today’s Daily Stoic Podcast.

Sign up for the Daily Stoic email: http://DailyStoic.com/signup

Follow us: Instagram, Twitter, YouTube, TikTok, and Facebook
